text: The countdown to the royal wedding is finally over as Prince Harry and Meghan Markle prepare to tie the knot after a turbulent week full of dramatic twists. More than a 100, 000 royal fans have lined the streets of Windsor to get a glimpse of the couple while millions of viewers around the world watch in anticipation. After stepping in as a late replacement it was revealed Prince Charles will walk Ms Markle down the aisle at 12pm before the royal couple say their vows. By 1pm the newlyweds will emerge at the West Steps of the Chapel where they'll be waved off on their carriage procession by members of both families. MailOnline brings you the latest updates.
